reason.raw: using a different name for the software family
reason.html: using a different name for the software family

description.raw:
The Ubuntu support is in place \(compiling ign-tools from a PR\) but the upstream code still needs to be fixed:

* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_plugins-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=1)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_plugins-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/1/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_plugins-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1/))



The Windows support is in place \(together with the[ gazebodistro PR](#!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/18/add-formula-for-ign-plugins/diff)\). It needs to compile the whole ignition family.

* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_plugins-pr-win/3//badge/icon)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign\_plugins-pr-win/3/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_plugins-pr-win/3/))



I’ve created the Mac formula but I think we can not test it until ign-tools PR has been merged. 

[https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/commit/6f6061c5ab61ccac2945cc42c290751a0b366933](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/commit/6f6061c5ab61ccac2945cc42c290751a0b366933)

title: Support for ignition-plugins CI
